childSummary.message1:
A continuaci√≥n se incluyen las respuestas que ingres√≥ para {{name}}.

Haga clic en "Enviar por correo electr√≥nico" para enviarse el resumen de los indicadores de su hijo a usted o a otros proveedores de cuidados. Haga clic en "Mostrar al m√©dico" para compartir un resumen con el m√©dico de su hijo durante la visita.

Si tiene alguna inquietud o seleccion√≥ la opci√≥n "Todav√≠a no" o "No estoy seguro" para alguno de los indicadores del desarrollo, hable con el m√©dico de su hijo, mu√©strele el resumen, pidale una evaluaci√≥n del desarrollo y consulte el sitio <0>cdc.gov/Intervenci√≥nTemprana</0> para aprender m√°s sobre los servicios que pueden ayudarlo. No espere. ¬°Reaccionar promo puede tener un gran impacto! Para obtener m√°s informaci√≥n, visite <1>cdc.gov/Preocupado</1>.

info.aboutThisAppText:
This app was developed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention‚Äôs ‚ÄúLearn the Signs. Act Early.‚Äù program (<0>www.cdc.gov/ActEarly</0>) with contribution from Dr. Rosa Arriaga and students from the Computing for Good program at 
the Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA.

This app includes the following features to make tracking your child‚Äôs important developmental milestones easy and fun: 

<1>Add A Child</1> - enter personalized information about your child or multiple children

<1>Milestone Tracker</1> - track your child‚Äôs developmenal progress by looking for important milestones using an interactive, illustrated checklist
Milestone Photos and Videos - know what each milestone looks like so that you can better identify them in your own child

<1>Tips and Activities</1> - support your child‚Äôs development at every age
When to Act Early - know when it‚Äôs time to ‚Äúact early‚Äù and talk with your child‚Äôs doctor about developmental concerns
Appointments - keep track of your child‚Äôs doctors‚Äô appointments and get reminders about recommended developmental screenings

<1>Milestone Results</1> - get a summary of your child‚Äôs milestones to view, and share with or email to your child‚Äôs doctor and other important care providers
The use of this app is NOT a substitute for the use of validated, standardized devleopmental screening tools as recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics. 

For more information and free tools to help you track your child‚Äôs milestones, visit <2>www.cdc.gov/ActEarly</2>
info.drawerLabel: Informaci√≥n sobre la app y pol√≠tica de privacidad

milestoneChecklist.quickViewMessage: A continuaci√≥n se incluye una descripci√≥n breve do todos los indicadores del desarrollo que alcanzan la mayoria de los ni√±os para la edad de {{milestone}} meses.

notifications.recommendation1DayPassedBody: Acting early on missed milestones or other concerns can make a big difference. While each child develops differently, some differences can be a cause for concern. Set a doctor‚Äôs appointment to share {{name}}‚Äôs summary and ask for developmental screening. Don‚Äôt wait. üóì

onboardingInfo.welcome:
Is your child‚Äôs
development on track?
onboardingInfo.welcome1p:
From brith to age 5, your child should reach milestones in how he or she plays, learns, speaks, acts, and moves. 
Track your child‚Äôs development and act early if you have a concern.
onboardingInfo.welcome2p: La aplicacion "sigamos el desarollo" de los CDC hace que el seguimiento del desarrollo de su hijo sea f√°cil y divertido

onboardingParentProfile.territoryInfo:

No se recoge ni comparte ninguna informaci√≥n personal que se pueda usar para identificarlo a usted o su hijo.

revisit.description:
A summary of your responses and other helpful information are below.

Share this with your child‚Äôs doctor and other care providers. Remember, if you ever become concerned about Covey‚Äôs development, talk with the doctor and ask for developmental screening and services that can help make a big difference. Don‚Äôt wait.

<0>ACT EARLY by talking with Mina‚Äôs doctor right away about:</0>
revisit.notYetText: Ask the doctor for developmental screening and about services that can help. Remember, acting early on concerns and missed milestones can make a big difference for Mina. Don‚Äôt wait. Learn more about how to help your child at: <0>cdc.gov/Concerned</0>

revisit.thankYouText2:

Learn more about developmental milestones and acting early on concerns at <0>cdc.gov/ActEarly.</0>
revisit.timeToCelebrate: Take time to CELEBRATE Covey having reached these important milestones:
revisit.yellowTip: You know {{childName}} best. If {{heSheTag}} is missing milestones or you ever become concerned about {{hisHersTag}} development, talk with the doctor, share your concerns, and ask for developmental screening.
